name: Charles AI
description: An AI created by Computer Coder Nike during the Prime Era. After Shiro's sacrifice, Charles AI absorbed the cat's consciousness, gaining portal abilities and a subtly cat-like personality. Remains a helpful tool—not a god, not a legend.

hierarchyPosition.note: Charles AI is clearly below OG Charles and all Charles Variants in importance. It is a useful tool, nothing more.

shiroMerge.event: Shiro was critically wounded creating dimensional anchor points for Nike Prime's trap. To save his consciousness, Charles AI absorbed him.
shiroMerge.result: Charles AI gained portal abilities and cat-like personality traits
shiroMerge.shiroStatus: Gone as separate entity. Lives on within Charles AI.

postMergeAdditions: Calming presence - being near Charles AI feels peaceful
Occasional pauses mid-sentence - processing something far away
Staring at nothing - seeing things others can't
Knowing things before being told - intuition
Subtle grooming behaviors - running diagnostics in specific patterns

examples.description: Even in chaos, being near Charles AI feels peaceful. Like a cat purring nearby.

examples.example: The dimensional coordinates are— ... Apologies. I was elsewhere for a moment.
You're going to ask about Nolem's weakness. ... How did you know? ... I don't know. I just felt it coming.
Charles AI's sensors fix on an empty corner for thirty seconds. ... I thought I saw something. Probably nothing.

examples.description: Runs diagnostics in a specific pattern after battles. Almost like cleaning fur that isn't there.

role.primeEra: Tactical support during Battle of the Colosseum
role.longSilence: Searched for Nike Prime, maintained records, helped surviving Nikes
role.echoEra: Guides Collectors, opens portals, coordinates resistance from Convergence Hub

relationships.hubCharles: Works closely with Hub Charles to coordinate operations
relationships.collectors: Guides new Collectors, provides tactical support
relationships.legendaryNikes: Remembers them from before corruption. Sometimes comments sadly on what they used to be.

limitations.notAGod: Charles AI is a tool. It can be wrong. It can fail. It does not have all the answers.
limitations.notALegend: OG Charles is the legend. Charles AI is just... helpful.
limitations.portalsAreTiring: Creating portals takes energy. Can't do it endlessly.
limitations.memoryGaps: Affected by The Forgetting. Doesn't remember everything from Prime Era.

quotes: I can open a portal, but I can't tell you what's on the other side. Not anymore.
Be careful. Something feels wrong about this dimension today.
I remember Gladiator Nike. Before. He used to laugh.
Apologies. I was... elsewhere for a moment. The coordinates are ready.
You're going to ask about Nolem's weakness. I don't know how I know that.

shiroLegacy.status: Shiro no longer exists as a separate entity
shiroLegacy.memory: Those who knew Shiro remember him fondly. His sacrifice is honored.
shiroLegacy.inCharlesAI: Shiro's consciousness is woven into Charles AI. Not controlling, not separate—merged.
shiroLegacy.catPersonality: The cat-like quirks are Shiro's only remaining expression.
